lcap-login/useNormal.description: Whether to enable normal login, enabled by default

lcap-login/useKW.description: Whether to enable Kubeworkz login, closed by default

lcap-login/useLdap.description: Whether to enable LDAP login, it is closed by default

lcap-login/useSaasHQ.description: Whether to enable OpenID login, it is closed by default

lcap-login/useGithub.description: Whether to enable Github login, it is closed by default

lcap-login/useFB.description: Whether to enable FB login, closed by default

lcap-login/useIcbc.description: Whether to enable ICBC login, closed by default
